column3:
Jenny was a 13 year old girl with blond hair and blue eyes.  She had gotten out of her
ewlinelast day of school and was free for the summer.  Two of her friends were going to the
ewlinenearby beach to do some swimming and enjoy the sun. Jenny went with them and when they got
ewlinethere the beach was very full and there were people everywhere.  They changed into their
ewlinebathing suits and went to the water.  The water was very cold.  They chose not swim and
ewlinewalked to the sand.  Then they laid down on some towels and enjoyed the sun.
ewline
ewlineAfter several hours Jenny and her friends fell asleep.  They woke up and the sun was
ewlinebeginning to set.  When Jenny sat up she found that it was painful to touch her skin.
ewlineWhen she looked down she saw that she had a very bad sunburn.  Her friends were also very
ewlinebadly sunburned so they went home.  Jenny's mother gave her a cream to put on the sunburn.
ewlineAfterwards she felt a lot better and went to sleep.
column4: multiple: Where was Jenny when her mother gave her the cream for the sunburn?
column9: one: How many friends did Jenny have with her?
column14: multiple: Where did Jenny and her friends lay down on the towels to enjoy the sun?
column19: one: What was the name of the girl with blond hair and blue eyes?
